thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 5 of 417
thread.title: Steven Hayward

author: Steven Hayward
title: Steven Hayward
text: This is the second time I have ordered from Oldies.com. Light years faster than the first experience a couple years ago. I had the movies this time in less than a week and they arrived in good condition. Easy ordering and good communication. No problems. The quality of the movies, themselves (not the fault of Oldies) was hideous...but I have no complaints about Oldies.com. I certainly intend to order from them in the future.
